data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: Jalama Beach Campground, California, USA (JAL)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at Jalama Beach Campground, California, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using StowAway Tidbit Temperature Loggers (Onset Computer Corp. TBIC32+4+27) beginning 2008-02-19. The instrument depth was 009 meters, in an overall water depth of 015 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 2.0 minutes.
